divs: sighting detailsthis one was moving at the usual speed. at 2 minutes it slowed a bit and changed direction from about 5 degrees to the north of dead on east to around 13 degrees to the north yet still heading east. as usual, no sound and no lights that blink. my wife saw it but after so many, did not stay to watch the thing fade. again about 3-4 times the size\brightness of jupiter. again lower altitude. will try to remember the camera next time.
Summary: Another extremely bright star-like object flying w. to e.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Chippewa Falls
There were no other sightings in Chippewa Falls on or around September 12th 2009
